title: June 28, 2024 — New geospatial H3 functions — General Availability | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
H3 is a hierarchical geospatial index that partitions
the world into hexagonal cells in a discrete global grid system.
The following H3 functions are now generally available:

For more information, see Geospatial data types and
Geospatial functions.
